= Get Spots =

== Request ==
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
 <tr><td>*URL*</td><td>[http://fabienrenaud.com/armp/www/getSpots.php]</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Method*</td><td>GET</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Authentication*</td><td>Not Required</td></tr>
</table>

Mandatory parameters:
 * latne = _double_
 * lngne = _double_
 * latsw = _double_
 * lngsw = _double_
 * zoom = 0 ≤ _int_ ≤ 20

Optional parameters:
 * _None_

== Response ==

That WS returns an xml file with the following tree:
 * *root*
  * {{{*}}} *spot* | id
   * _spot elements_

The spot elements are the following:
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
<tr><td>*name*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The name of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*user*</td><td>_string_</td><td>The name of the user who created the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*latitude*</td><td>_double_</td><td>The latitude of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*longitude*</td><td>_double_</td><td>The longitude of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*radius*</td><td>_int_</td><td>The radius, in meters, of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*color*</td><td>_string_</td><td>An HTML color code for the color of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*creation*</td><td>_int_</td><td>A unix timestamp date of the creation of the spot</td></tr>
<tr><td>*update*</td><td>_int_</td><td>A unix timestamp date of the last update of the spot</td></tr>
</table>

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
